p: The nutritional quality of the lipid fraction was assessed using the atherogenicity index: AI = (C12:0 + (4 × C14:0) + C16:0)/(ΣMUFAs) + Σω6 + Σω3) and thrombogenicity index [ 24]: TI = (C14:0 + C16:0 + C18:0)/[(ΣMUFAs × 0.5) + (0.5 × Σω6) + (3 × Σω3) + (Σω3/Σω6)] and the ratio of hypocholesterolemic to hypercholesterolemic fatty acids [ 25]: h/H = [(C18:1 cis-9 + C18:2 ω6 + C18:3 ω3 + C20:5 ω3 + C22:6 ω3)/(C14:0 + 16:0)]
